results.description: Bayern Munich go four points clear at the top of the Bundesliga with victory over 10-man Hannover as Dortmund drop points.
results.shortTitle: Bayern win to move closer to title
results.title: Bayern Munich 3-1 Hannover 96: Hosts extend Bundesliga lead over Borussia Dortmund

thumbnail.altText: Kingsley Coman, Robert Lewandowski, Leon Goretzka

results.description: Hannover's Genki Haraguchi is denied a certain goal in their 3-2 defeat against Bayer Leverkusen when the ball gets stuck in the snow before it crosses the line.
results.title: Snow denies Hannover goal in Bundesliga

results.description: Jadon Sancho provides two more assists as Borussia Dortmund thrash Hannover to extend their lead at the top of the Bundesliga to nine points.
results.shortTitle: Two Sancho assists in Dortmund thrashing
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 5-1 Hannover 96: Jadon Sancho provides two assists

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores his 39th goal of the season as Champions League semi-finalists Bayern Munich beat Hannover.
results.title: Hannover 0-3 Bayern Munich

results.description: Michy Batshuayi's spectacular volley gives Borussia Dortmund a win over Hannover and extends Dortmund's unbeaten league run to 12 games.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 1-0 Hannover 96

results.description: Bayern Munich go six points clear at the top of the Bundesliga by beating Hannover, with RB Leipzig losing 4-0 at Hoffenheim.
results.title: Bayern Munich 3-1 Hannover

results.description: A police officer had to go to hospital with a head injury after disturbances at Burnley's friendly at home to Hannover.
results.shortTitle: Police officer hurt in Turf Moor trouble
results.title: Burnley v Hannover trouble: Police officer had to go to hospital
